My sneaky drinking is going to get caught.\""},{"lineNumber":14772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……気のせいか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Was it just my imagination?"},{"lineNumber":14773,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さて、今日は食事を……あら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, time for a meal... huh?\""},{"lineNumber":14774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ、この小瓶……辛みエキスだよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, this little bottle... is it the spicy extract?"},{"lineNumber":14775,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰か出しっぱなしでしまってないのかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe someone left it out without putting it away.\""},{"lineNumber":14776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、お食事です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance, your meal is ready.\""},{"lineNumber":14777,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、ご苦労」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, thanks for your hard work.\""},{"lineNumber":14778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いただきますれす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's eat!\""},{"lineNumber":14779,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつもながら、あてながメシを食ってると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As always, when Atene is eating,"},{"lineNumber":14780,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どことなく違和感が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's a certain strangeness...\""},{"lineNumber":14781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむ！　あてなさべつれすか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm! Are you discriminating against Atene!?"},{"lineNumber":14782,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それはよくない……もぐもぐぐがぴぴぴーー」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's not good... *munch munch* gup pipipi—\""},{"lineNumber":14783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わ、あてなちゃん！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-wait, Atene-chan!?\""},{"lineNumber":14784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また変なもん食って変になったか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did you eat something weird again and go crazy?"},{"lineNumber":14785,"originalJapaneseLine":"　っと、俺も食うか…………はぐはぐ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I'll eat some too... *nom nom...*\""},{"lineNumber":14786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んぐっ…………！　これ、はっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nggh...! This is... ha...!\""},{"lineNumber":14787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カッ…………カラウマーーーーーー！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Spicy... and deliciousーー!!\""},{"lineNumber":14788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「キムチさん！　やっぱりキムチさんか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kimchi-san! So it really is Kimchi-san!\""},{"lineNumber":14789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Rance."},{"lineNumber":14790,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日のごはん、美味しかった？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Was today's meal delicious?\""},{"lineNumber":14791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「不意討ちでぶたキムチだったからびっくりした」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was surprised by the sudden pork kimchi.\""},{"lineNumber":14792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはは、よかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha, I'm glad.\""},{"lineNumber":14793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美味かったぞ。お代わりあるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was delicious. Is there any more?\""},{"lineNumber":14794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「子供たちに作ったキムチまんじゅうなら。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it’s the kimchi buns I made for the kids,"},{"lineNumber":14795,"originalJapaneseLine":"　けどね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but you know...\""},{"lineNumber":14796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カラウマアアァァァァァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Spicy and delicious ahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":14797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かっ、カラウマですわあああぁぁぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it's spicy and delicious ahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":14798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あちこちで他の連中が悶絶してるぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Others all over the place are writhing in agony...\""},{"lineNumber":14799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ騒々しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's all this noise?"},{"lineNumber":14800,"originalJapaneseLine":"　新型を作ろうと集中してたのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was concentrating on making the new model...\""},{"lineNumber":14801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「キムチさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kimchi-san.\""},{"lineNumber":14802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":14803,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが差し出した手にキムチまんじゅうが渡る。","translatedEnglishLine":"A kimchi bun was handed into the hand Rance extended."},{"lineNumber":14804,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてそれがサテラの口にねじ込まれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then it was forced into Satella's mouth."},{"lineNumber":14805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はむぷっ……んん、なんだこれ、は………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Munch... hmm, what is this, ha...\""},{"lineNumber":14806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＃％＆＄＆＄＃＆＃＆〜＝〜＝＊〜＝〜＊！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"#%&$&$#&#&~=~=*~=~*!?\""},{"lineNumber":14807,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが膝から崩れ落ちた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella collapsed to her knees."},{"lineNumber":14808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……んー、ちょっと刺激が強すぎたかな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm, maybe the spice was a bit too strong..."},{"lineNumber":14809,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大勢に作る物だから加減間違えたかも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it's made for a large group, maybe I misjudged the amount...\""},{"lineNumber":14810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま……今のは気にしなくていい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... don't worry about that just now."},{"lineNumber":14811,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おいしかったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was delicious.\""},{"lineNumber":14812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはは、ありがと。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha, thanks."},{"lineNumber":14813,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、お昼は普通の物に戻すよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I'll switch back to normal food for lunch.\""},{"lineNumber":14814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さーて、さっさと仕込んじゃいますかね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, let's get this prepared quickly..."},{"lineNumber":14815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　キムチは、よけておいて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll set the kimchi aside...\""},{"lineNumber":14816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつもと同じ分量だと思ったんだけどな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought I used the usual amount, though..."},{"lineNumber":14817,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ん、あれ、この瓶……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, this bottle..."},{"lineNumber":14818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……これ、辛みエキス？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is this spicy extract?"},{"lineNumber":14819,"originalJapaneseLine":"　朝方に使ったつもりだったのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought I had used this in the morning..."},{"lineNumber":14820,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちが本物……ってこと、は……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"So this is the real one... does that mean...?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味覚の鋭敏化と引き替えに知能が低下する薬しか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only drug available is one that sharpens the sense of taste but lowers intelligence...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できないとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what I can't do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃぷっ、とパパイアの手の中で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a splash, inside Papaya's hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小瓶の中身が波を立てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the contents of the small bottle rippled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、よっぽど刺激的な味でないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, unless it's an extremely stimulating flavor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと欲しがりさんになるだけだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it just makes you a little craving more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて……寝酒にもう一杯……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... one more drink before bed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その小瓶を傍らに置き、パパイアは酒瓶を手にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Placing the small bottle beside her, Papaya took the sake bottle in her hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カップに注ごうとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tried to pour it into the cup.
"...Oh, someone...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、やばっ。盗み飲みがばれちゃうっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, oh no. My sneaky drinking is going to get caught."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……気のせいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Was it just my imagination?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて、今日は食事を……あら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, time for a meal... huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、この小瓶……辛みエキスだよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, this little bottle... is it the spicy extract?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か出しっぱなしでしまってないのかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe someone left it out without putting it away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、お食事です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, your meal is ready."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、ご苦労」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, thanks for your hard work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いただきますれす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's eat!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつもながら、あてながメシを食ってると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As always, when Atene is eating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どことなく違和感が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's a certain strangeness..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむ！　あてなさべつれすか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm! Are you discriminating against Atene!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはよくない……もぐもぐぐがぴぴぴーー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not good... *munch munch* gup pipipi—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わ、あてなちゃん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-w-wait, Atene-chan!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また変なもん食って変になったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you eat something weird again and go crazy?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: っと、俺も食うか…………はぐはぐ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'll eat some too... *nom nom...*"
"Nggh...! This is... ha...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カッ…………カラウマーーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spicy... and deliciousーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キムチさん！　やっぱりキムチさんか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kimchi-san! So it really is Kimchi-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日のごはん、美味しかった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was today's meal delicious?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「不意討ちでぶたキムチだったからびっくりした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was surprised by the sudden pork kimchi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、よかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, I'm glad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美味かったぞ。お代わりあるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was delicious. Is there any more?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「子供たちに作ったキムチまんじゅうなら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it’s the kimchi buns I made for the kids,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you know..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラウマアアァァァァァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spicy and delicious ahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かっ、カラウマですわあああぁぁぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's spicy and delicious ahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あちこちで他の連中が悶絶してるぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Others all over the place are writhing in agony..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ騒々しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's all this noise?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新型を作ろうと集中してたのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was concentrating on making the new model..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キムチさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kimchi-san."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが差し出した手にキムチまんじゅうが渡る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A kimchi bun was handed into the hand Rance extended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそれがサテラの口にねじ込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then it was forced into Satella's mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はむぷっ……んん、なんだこれ、は………………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch... hmm, what is this, ha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが膝から崩れ落ちた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella collapsed to her knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……んー、ちょっと刺激が強すぎたかな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm, maybe the spice was a bit too strong...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勢に作る物だから加減間違えたかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's made for a large group, maybe I misjudged the amount..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま……今のは気にしなくていい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... don't worry about that just now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいしかったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、ありがと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, thanks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、お昼は普通の物に戻すよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'll switch back to normal food for lunch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、さっさと仕込んじゃいますかね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let's get this prepared quickly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キムチは、よけておいて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll set the kimchi aside..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつもと同じ分量だと思ったんだけどな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought I used the usual amount, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、あれ、この瓶……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this bottle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これ、辛みエキス？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is this spicy extract?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝方に使ったつもりだったのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I had used this in the morning...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちが本物……ってこと、は……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the real one... does that mean...?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味覚の鋭敏化と引き替えに知能が低下する薬しか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only drug available is one that sharpens the sense of taste but lowers intelligence...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できないとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what I can't do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃぷっ、とパパイアの手の中で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a splash, inside Papaya's hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小瓶の中身が波を立てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the contents of the small bottle rippled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、よっぽど刺激的な味でないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, unless it's an extremely stimulating flavor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと欲しがりさんになるだけだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it just makes you a little craving more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて……寝酒にもう一杯……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... one more drink before bed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その小瓶を傍らに置き、パパイアは酒瓶を手にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Placing the small bottle beside her, Papaya took the sake bottle in her hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カップに注ごうとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tried to pour it into the cup.
"...Oh, someone...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、やばっ。盗み飲みがばれちゃうっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, oh no. My sneaky drinking is going to get caught."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……気のせいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Was it just my imagination?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて、今日は食事を……あら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, time for a meal... huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、この小瓶……辛みエキスだよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, this little bottle... is it the spicy extract?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か出しっぱなしでしまってないのかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe someone left it out without putting it away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、お食事です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance, your meal is ready."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、ご苦労」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, thanks for your hard work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いただきますれす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's eat!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつもながら、あてながメシを食ってると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As always, when Atene is eating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どことなく違和感が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's a certain strangeness..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむ！　あてなさべつれすか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm! Are you discriminating against Atene!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはよくない……もぐもぐぐがぴぴぴーー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not good... *munch munch* gup pipipi—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わ、あてなちゃん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-w-wait, Atene-chan!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また変なもん食って変になったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you eat something weird again and go crazy?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: っと、俺も食うか…………はぐはぐ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'll eat some too... *nom nom...*"
"Nggh...! This is... ha...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カッ…………カラウマーーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spicy... and deliciousーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キムチさん！　やっぱりキムチさんか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kimchi-san! So it really is Kimchi-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日のごはん、美味しかった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was today's meal delicious?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「不意討ちでぶたキムチだったからびっくりした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was surprised by the sudden pork kimchi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、よかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, I'm glad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美味かったぞ。お代わりあるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was delicious. Is there any more?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「子供たちに作ったキムチまんじゅうなら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it’s the kimchi buns I made for the kids,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you know..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラウマアアァァァァァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Spicy and delicious ahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かっ、カラウマですわあああぁぁぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's spicy and delicious ahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あちこちで他の連中が悶絶してるぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Others all over the place are writhing in agony..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ騒々しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's all this noise?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新型を作ろうと集中してたのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was concentrating on making the new model..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キムチさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kimchi-san."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが差し出した手にキムチまんじゅうが渡る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A kimchi bun was handed into the hand Rance extended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそれがサテラの口にねじ込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then it was forced into Satella's mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はむぷっ……んん、なんだこれ、は………………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Munch... hmm, what is this, ha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが膝から崩れ落ちた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella collapsed to her knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……んー、ちょっと刺激が強すぎたかな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm, maybe the spice was a bit too strong...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勢に作る物だから加減間違えたかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's made for a large group, maybe I misjudged the amount..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま……今のは気にしなくていい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... don't worry about that just now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいしかったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、ありがと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, thanks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、お昼は普通の物に戻すよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'll switch back to normal food for lunch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、さっさと仕込んじゃいますかね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let's get this prepared quickly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キムチは、よけておいて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll set the kimchi aside..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつもと同じ分量だと思ったんだけどな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought I used the usual amount, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、あれ、この瓶……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this bottle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これ、辛みエキス？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is this spicy extract?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝方に使ったつもりだったのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I had used this in the morning...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちが本物……ってこと、は……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the real one... does that mean...?
